notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was financed by the Drug Applied Research Center, Tabriz University of Medical Science, Tabriz, Iran (Grant No. 58972) and the Iran National Science Foundation (Grant No. 97008952). This work was supported by the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF) grant funded by the Korean government (MSIT) (2018R1A2B2006879).
